comments.body: Actually these permissions are a bit weird for a file; for a file I'd expect 660 (not 770). It's also unnecessary since to delete a file you need write permission to the directory only.
Hmm the old `EventLoggingListener` uses 770 also. Maybe it should be changed to 660, and have a separate constant for file permissions and directory permissions.
Yeah I just used the existing permissions. Not sure why they were set with the executable bit in the first place. I can change the files to only have 660 if there's no reason not to.
Yes please go ahead and fix it altogether.
Changed the file permission to 660 and added a separate folder permission for 770
